dhp371:1: Jhāya bhikkhu → jhāya tuvaṃ bhikkhu (?) | pamādo → mā ca pamādo (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1ed); mā ca pāmado (pts-vp-pli2ed)
dhp371:2: ramessu → bhamassu (bj, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed); bhavassu (cck, sya1ed); ramassu (mr)
dhp378:2: santavā susamāhito → santamano susamāhito (sya-all); santamano samāhito (mr)
dhp379:2: paṭimaṃsetha attanā → paṭimāsettamattanā (bj, cck, pts-vp-pli1ed); paṭimaṃsetamattanā (sya1ed, sya2ed); paṭimāse attamattanā (pts-vp-pli2ed)
dhp380:2: ko hi nātho paro siyā →  etthantare pāṭho videsapotthakesu
dhp380:4: saṃyamamattānaṃ → saññamaya'ttānaṃ (bj, cck); saññama attānaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); aññamay'attānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed); saññāmay'attānaṃ (pts-vp-pli2ed)
dhp382:3: Somaṃ → so imaṃ (bj, sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed)
